name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Latest news on Chinese entry into Italy
According to the Italian Ministry of Health, from now until January 30, passengers flying from China to Italy🇮🇹 need to present a PCR result within 72 hours before departure or a nucleic acid test within 48 hours before departure to board the plane, and they will need to undergo another nucleic acid test after entering the country.
